description: Daño al enemigo.
name: Ataque
note:
<setup action>
display action
immortal: targets, true
</setup action>

<target action>
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
  move user: targets, front, 20
else
  perform start
end
wait for movement
motion attack: user
wait: 10
attack animation: target
wait for animation
action effect
</target action>

description: Protege el cuerpo, reduciendo el daño.

description: Poderoso ataque contra un enemigo.
name: Ataque Poderoso
note:
<setup action>
display action
inmortal: targets,true
perform start
wait for movement
cast animation
wait for animation
</setup action>

<whole action>
</whole action>

<target action>
camera focus: target
zoom: 120%, 30
wait for zoom
opacity not focus: 0, 60
wait for opacity
move user: target, front base, 5
wait for movement
face user: target
jump user: 300, 35
motion swing: user
perform action
motion wait: user
action animation
wait for animation
action effect
death break
</target action>

<follow action>
zoom: 100%, 60
opacity not focus: 100%, 60
wait for opacity
</follow action>

<finish action>
inmortal: targets,false
clear battle log
perform finish
</finish action>
